name: VAGABOND (itch)
description:
DESCRIPTION:

“If you want to be with someone you love, aren't you already there?"

Vagabond follows our hero, a ten-year-old kid, exploring their new home after a house move with only their sense of adventure to guide them. Collect old memories, create new ones and explore your new surroundings as you learn that home is truly where the heart is.

CONTROLS: 

Left/ Right to walk

Up to Jump

Space to interact

SOFTWARE: 

Game Maker Studio2/ Aseprite

MUSIC: 

Tractus Music ; https://www.instagram.com/tractusmusi...

Special thanks to;

Fern Stocks, Andrew Welch and everyone at the UCLan Games Design team!

My UCLan Portfolio Page:

https://gamescourse.co.uk/portfolio-item/vagabond-pixel-adventure/
